amendment.description: To provide funds to support the development of responsible justice and reconciliation mechanisms in central Africa.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2020 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2020 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S13368; text: CR S13368) To provide funds to support the development of responsible justice and reconciliation mechanisms in central Africa.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2020 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2020 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Feingold.
